trigger_description: This trigger fires when your Arlo device detects motion for a specific object type. This requires an Arlo Smart subscription for each device that is configured in the trigger.
This Trigger fires every time Arlo reports low battery level on the selected Arlo device.
This Trigger fires every time when audio is detected on your Arlo device.
This Trigger fires when your Arlo device detects motion.
